casebody.data:
MCS MANAGEMENT, INC., PlaintiffAppellant, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant-Appellee. No. 01-5049. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Dec. 7, 2001.

*958Before SCHALL, Circuit Judge, ARCHER, Senior Circuit Judge, and BRYSON, Circuit Judge.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
